title: quantity
description: An item representing a numerical value.

value.description: The numerical value associated with this Quantity.

error_value.description: Symmetric, one-sigma error associated with this Quantity's value.

error_upper.description: Upper (plus) one-sigma error on this Quantity's value.

error_lower.description: Lower (minus) one-sigma error on this Quantity's value.

upper_limit.description: Lower (minus) one-sigma error on this Quantity's value.

lower_limit.description: Lower (minus) one-sigma error on this Quantity's value.

derived.description: Whether or not this Quantity is derived from other parameters/observations.

description.description: Any additional descriptive/meta information about this quantity.

units_value.description: The units with which this Quantity's value is stored.

units_error.description: The units with which this Quantity's errors are stored.
